Honestly, this was the worst AirBnB experience my family has ever had.
I can only give it 2 stars- 1 for location and 1 for cleanliness.
Things you should know before booking that are not plainly listed in description:
1. Only street parking is available for this location and it is limited to 2 hours during the weekdays until 6PM.
2. The owners bathroom only has a tub- no shower. The only shower option is a 4sq. ft. stall shower located in the second bathroom.
3. There are ~20 stairs that you have to walk up to access the apartment. It may not be ideal if youâ€™re bringing a lot of items or have decreased mobility.
Itâ€™s clear that the host has tried to make the space nice but there are several small things that could be done to make the experience significantly better. There were only 6 towels that were provided to us- all mismatched and stained (plus just one hand towel for two bathrooms and a handful of washcloths). The living room has no side tables or coffee table, so if you have a drink while sitting on the couch you have to set it on the floor. At least 3 lightbulbs were burned out. We were only provided with 1/2 a roll of toilet paper per bathroom for the weekend. The window/mini-split AC units are all loud and inefficient and woke us up throughout the night. The Wifi was spotty.
Check-in is supposed to be at 3PM. We messaged the seller just before 2PM and told her that we did not expect to be let in early but would like to be let in right at 3:00. At 3:00 there was no one there to meet us so we called twice, knocked on the door- all with no answer. At 3:15 she called to ask where we were, but never apologized for being late or missing our calls. We also contacted the host one time during our stay to ask a question and she said she would call back with an answer but never did. Thatâ€™s just not kind or professional.
I would never recommend this to a friend or consider staying there again.

Once up the 20 or so stairs, we entered a comfortable apartment with kitchen and laundry. On the patio, traffic from Beach Boulevard could be noisy, but the fine views more than made up for it.
The home looks freshly built and is well accessorized for a comfortable stay
